name: .FORTH File Extension
summary: Learn about .FORTH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Code file for Forth programming language, which is supported by several different text editors for features such as syntax highlighting; contains Forth programming language similar to how .C files contain C or C++ source code; same file format as the .4TH file.

content: Forth language's format is based on data stack and RPN (Revers Polish Notation). A simple example of its format:
This format equals to 7 multiplied by 8 plus 23, with "." printing the result of the mathematical equation to the user terminal.
NOTE: To create a FORTH file simply rename the extension of your plain text file that contains the Forth source code.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
